summary: A PyTorch-based implementation of the Point Cloud Transformer (PCT) architecture, offering dataset loaders for ModelNet and ShapeNet, preprocessing and augmentation utilities, transformer‑style neural network components for 3D point‑cloud classification and part‑segmentation, and end‑to‑end training scripts to reproduce the paper’s results.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to quickly experiment with and benchmark transformer models on 3D point‑cloud tasks, facilitating product development and academic work in areas such as autonomous navigation, robotics, and AR/VR where shape understanding is required.
